titleStmt.title: Jethro's character of worthy judges an assise-sermon preached at Northampton, March 22, 1663 / by Antonie Scattergood.
titleStmt.author: Scattergood, Antony, 1611-1687.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.G. for Richard Marriott, and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: "Ornatissimo viro Eduardo Onley agri Northamtoniensis vicecomiti, et lectissimæ ejus conjugi Margaretæ, Antonius Scattergood hanc opellam D.D.D."--P. [1]
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
